title: How it feels to lane with DJ Sona
body:
https://i.imgur.com/2STqMj1.gif[/img]

Just focus on CSing... focus on... cs...

replies.body: MF and Sona botlane is a **busted** duo.
And then the bass drops, and you suddenly got pentakill.
Interesting fact: According to a statistic I just made up, teams with DJ Sona are 80% more likely to win due due to the music giving extra hype

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zLMvQaEE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-07T23:57:35.374+0000)
>
> Interesting fact: According to a statistic I just made up, teams with DJ Sona are 80% more likely to win due due to the music giving extra hype

My DJ Sona says that 99.9% of her teammates are deaf and don't listen to anything other than Kinetic. 

And death metal.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenKnight,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zLMvQaEE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-08T00:06:09.957+0000)
>
> My DJ Sona says that 99.9% of her teammates are deaf and don't listen to anything other than Kinetic. 
> 
> And death metal.

https://i.imgur.com/UfcvHRB.gif[]
Jokes on you, I just pick Kai'Sa.
